section.title: Repo Studio Files and Folders
section.para: Repo Studio has several key files and folders, listed in the table below.

row.entry: Repo Studio looks for this file to locate repostudio configuration. See the repostudio and repostudio.conf man pages for more information. This file is optional and does not exist in the default Repo Studio installation.
Python code for Repo Studio, where $version is the Python version.
Documentation for Repo Studio, where $version is the Repo Studio version.
Relax NG schemas for repository definition validation.
Templates for use in definition creation. See the section on in the Glossary of Terms for more information.
Repo Studio stores cached content in this folder. See the repostudio and repostudio.conf man pages for cache-related options.
Location where Repo Studio stores variable data including data for troubleshooting installed config-rpm and deployment scripts.

Repo Studio publishes completed repositories to system and package subfolders of this folder by default. An alternative location can be specified on a per-repository basis within a repository definition.
